short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rank other players! Click on player's ping to open rank's menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Will not work on your own room*
The Player Rank Selector is a handy Chrome extension designed for gamers and game enthusiasts. It allows users to easily manage and select player ranks directly from their browser. With a simple click, users can open a rank menu and choose from a variety of ranks.
Each rank is color-coded for easy identification.

The extension is designed to enhance the gaming experience by providing a quick and easy way to manage player ranks. It seamlessly integrates into the player's interface, ensuring a smooth and uninterrupted gaming experience.
